author: lightclient
content:
have any teams though much about how to handle overrides w.r.t to osaka / BPOs / and the blob config?

in the past we try to make an effort to have a timestamp overrride flag in case something goes wrong at the last moment and we need to coordinate a new timestamp. it is also very helpful for testing.

however now with BPO and the many fork-based parameters it seems like a lot to deal with so many override flags for each BPO and for the blob config values
